text.content: I'm gonna wait till the midnight hour  That's when my love comes tumbling down  I'm gonna wait till the midnight hour  I'm gonna take you girl and hold you  Do all things I told you in the midnight hour    I'm gonna hold you in my arms and see the twinkle in your eyes  I'm gonna wait till the midnight hour  That's when my love begins to shine  Youre the only girl I know  Really love you so in the midnight hour
